Narrated Abu Hurairah that Messenger of Allah{" "} (ﷺ) said

"Whoever takes a path upon which to obtain knowledge, Allah makes the path to Paradise easy for him."

- Jami` at-Tirmidhi 2646

{/* Bullet points */} {/*
  • ✔ We take pride in fostering strong, lasting relationships

At Bayyinah Academy, we offer high-quality online Quran and Arabic language education course to learners of all ages. Our qualified and experience tutors are committed to helping you achieve fluency and a deep understanding of both the Quran and the Arabic language. With the guidance of our dedicated native tutor, you'll unlock the beauty of the Quran while mastering Arabic. Join us on this journey of spiritual and linguistic growth!
